title: How to Beat the Twins in Terraria

steps.headline: Build a proper fighting area.
steps.description: The Twins mostly attack by charging, so a long skybridge (preferably made of asphalt) is recommended. You may keep multiple campfires or heart lanterns for faster healing. You can also connect heart and star statues through wires to gain hearts and mana at crucial times.

steps.headline: Gear up.
steps.description:
The Twins are very fast, so Melee weapons are not recommended. You must have the following:
5-10 Healing Potions
Lightning/ Frostspark boots

Wings (If possible)
Multiple buff potions

steps.headline: Get good armor.
steps.description: Titanium/Adamantite armor is recommended, it has a great set bonus and multiple buffs. If Titanium/Adamantite armor is not available, Mithril or Orichalcum armor will also do.

steps.headline: Get strong weapons.
steps.description:
Weapons required are:
A Ranged weapon/ Magic weapon
Nimbus Rod if possible

steps.headline: Stand at an end of your sky bridge and spawn them.
Use the nimbus rod.
steps.description: Use it wherever you think it will hit the boss, and refresh them often.

steps.headline: Focus your fire on Spazmatism first.
steps.description: When it is killed, focus on Retinazer.

steps.headline: Run back when you run to the other end of the sky bridge.
steps.description: At this point you are pretty vulnerable to their projectiles, focus on dodging them first.

text:
Preparing the Fight Area Build a proper fighting area. The Twins mostly attack by charging, so a long skybridge (preferably made of asphalt) is recommended. You may keep multiple campfires or heart lanterns for faster healing. You can also connect heart and star statues through wires to gain hearts and mana at crucial times. Gear up. The Twins are very fast, so Melee weapons are not recommended. You must have the following:
5-10 Healing Potions
Lightning/ Frostspark boots

Wings (If possible)
Multiple buff potions Get good armor. Titanium/Adamantite armor is recommended, it has a great set bonus and multiple buffs. If Titanium/Adamantite armor is not available, Mithril or Orichalcum armor will also do. Get strong weapons. Weapons required are:
A Ranged weapon/ Magic weapon
Nimbus Rod if possible Engaging in Battle Stand at an end of your sky bridge and spawn them.  Use the nimbus rod. Use it wherever you think it will hit the boss, and refresh them often. Focus your fire on Spazmatism first. When it is killed, focus on Retinazer. Run back when you run to the other end of the sky bridge. At this point you are pretty vulnerable to their projectiles, focus on dodging them first. Dodge Spazmatism's eye fire. It does the most damage.
